description: Dashboard for monitoring SFS Meta service performance and operations

targets.expr: label_replace((sum( rate( sfs_rpc_response_duration_sum {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id",method=~"^Method.*"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method) / sum( rate( sfs_rpc_response_duration_count {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id",method=~"^Method.*"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method)), "display_method", "$1", "method", "^Method\\(([^)]+)\\)")
targets.query: label_replace((sum( rate( sfs_rpc_response_duration_sum {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id",method=~"^Method.*"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method) / sum( rate( sfs_rpc_response_duration_count {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id",method=~"^Method.*"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method)), "display_method", "$1", "method", "^Method\\(([^)]+)\\)")

targets.expr: (((sum( rate( uzfs_request_latency_ns_sum {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method) / sum( rate( uzfs_request_latency_ns_count {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method)) / 1000000) or ((sum( rate( sfs_uzfs_request_latency_ns_sum {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method) / sum( rate( sfs_uzfs_request_latency_ns_count {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method)) / 1000000))
targets.query: (((sum( rate( uzfs_request_latency_ns_sum {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method) / sum( rate( uzfs_request_latency_ns_count {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method)) / 1000000) or ((sum( rate( sfs_uzfs_request_latency_ns_sum {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method) / sum( rate( sfs_uzfs_request_latency_ns_count {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} [$__rate_interval] ) ) by (method)) / 1000000))

targets.expr: (sum( uzfs_request_concurrency {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} ) by (instance) or sum( sfs_uzfs_request_concurrency {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} ) by (instance))
targets.query: (sum( uzfs_request_concurrency {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} ) by (instance) or sum( sfs_uzfs_request_concurrency {cluster="$cluster",instance="$node",shard_id="$shard_id"} ) by (instance))
